#!/bin/bash # configure koji sed -i /etc/kojiweb/web.conf s/server.example.com/localhost sed -i /etc/kojiweb/web.conf s/hub.example.com/localhost echo "
DBHost = localhost" >> /etc/koji-hub/hub.conf
# setup and start postgres postgresql-setup initdb echo "
host koji koji 127.0.0.1/32 trust
host koji koji ::1/128 trust" >> /var/lib/pgsql/data/pg_hba.conf systemctl start postgresql.service systemctl enable postgresql.service su postgres -c "createuser -SDR koji" su postgres -c "createdb -O koji koji" psql koji koji < /usr/share/doc/koji*/docs/schema.sql
# start httpd systemctl start httpd.service systemctl enable httpd.service
